messages.subject: Re: Nobuie Tsuba
messages.msgSnippet: Yakite shitate -- that would be a fun piece to see.  It makes one wonder how many smiths experimented with tsuba or other items? ... Gassan Sadakazu,
messages.messageBody:
Yakite shitate -- that would be a fun piece to see. It makes one
wonder how many smiths experimented with tsuba or other items?





--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Alan Bale" <abale@v...> wrote:
>
> A couple of years ago I picked up in Sotheby's a Nobuie copy tsuba by
Gassan Sadakazu, interestingly he had tried to copy the porcelain like
glaze on the originals.
> Alan
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>

A couple of years ago I picked up in Sotheby's a Nobuie copy tsuba by Gassan Sadakazu, interestingly he had tried to copy the porcelain like glaze on the originals.
Alan
